---
title: "Presentation slides"
description: |
  Slides for presentations that I've given.
site: 
    distill::distill_website:
        search: false
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
# knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
slides <- fs::dir_ls(recurse = TRUE, glob = "*.html|Rmd") %>% 
    str_subset("_site/.*", negate = TRUE) 

title <- slides %>% 
    str_subset(".*/.*/*.Rmd") %>% 
    map(rmarkdown::yaml_front_matter) %>% 
    map("title") %>% 
    compact() %>% 
    unlist()

link <- slides %>% 
    str_subset(".*/.*/*.html") 

link %>% 
    str_split("/") %>% 
    map(str_subset, "html", negate = TRUE) %>% 
    # TODO: Put location in yaml of slides, rather than here based on filename
    map_dfr(set_names, c("location", "date")) %>% 
    mutate(location = str_to_upper(location) %>% 
               str_replace("STENO", "Steno Aarhus"),
           link = link,
           title = title) %>%
    arrange(desc(date)) %>% 
    mutate(date = stamp_date("March 1, 1999")(as_date(date))) %>% 
    glue::glue_data("- **{date}**: [*{title}*]({link}) talk for {location}") %>% 
    clipr::write_clip()
```
